sections.heading: suggestion system; award granted; amount
sections.text: Any award granted shall be the greater of one hundred dollars or ten percent of the amount of savings referred to in section 81-1353 but not to exceed the limitations provided for in section 81-1351.SourceLaws 1978, LB 286, ยง 5;Laws 1993, LB 44, ยง 16;Laws 200
